lead_paragraph: Vince Young, the Tennessee Titans quarterback who led Texas to the 2005 national championship, is back in class this semester, working toward his degree in education. “I just wanted to come back and finish up because I wanted to show not only myself and my family, but all the people that have respect for me, that school is the key,” Young said. He is taking 12 hours this semester.
